name: Nordic Public Service Broadcasters
goal: The overall mission and objective of Nordic PSB is to safeguard and promote the interests of the Nordic public service broadcasters in relation to European affairs and regulations. To strengthen the position of public service broadcasting in the Nordic countries and Europe. Nordic PSB closely follows the work and activities in the different institutions of the European Union and The Council of Europe dealing with the audiovisual sector.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
Digital Single market
AVMS refit
e-comm refit
copyright reform
State Aid questions
plattforms
